txt.en:
'According to our maps and Balin's own records, there is a mining site along the tunnel where you began to fret for your safety.

'You should try to overcome your worry and see what you can find there of Balin's expedition. My hope is that there is great potential in that mine for our own dwarves!

'Do let me know what you find, [placeholder]. I am counting on you!'
'By axe and sword, [placeholder]! You have my deepest apologies. I did not realize how bad things really were down here. We will need an entire garrison to clear these mines properly.'
'Very well then! You will see; we will be finding veins of mithril and clusters of gems in no time!'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is a Solo quest, and cannot be completed with a Fellowship.</rgb>
Despite the dread you felt, Gufi wishes for you to explore an old mining site set upon by Balin's expedition.
Talk to Gufi to travel to the mine-site
Gufi is at the Menem-berej encampment in the centre of the Silvertine Lodes.\n\nYou should speak with Gufi to travel to the prospective mining site.
Gufi is at the Menem-berej encampment in the centre of the Silvertine Lodes.\n\nYou should speak with Gufi about the survey-expedition.
